feed.title: Channel-Port aux Basques - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WRECKHOUSE WIND WARNING , Channel-Port aux Basques
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:20 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Channel-Port aux Basques
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:25 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port aux Basques 12:30 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023
Temperature: -2.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -7.7°C
Wind: W 41 km/h gust 51 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 near midnight then south 30 gusting to 50. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain at times heavy or snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning then changing to rain at times heavy in the afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming south 50 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 in the Wreckhouse area in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023
